title: Porto da Cruz (Ilhéu, Porto e Ribeira de)
original_title: Porto da Cruz (Ilhéu, Porto e Ribeira de)
body: Near the coastal area of this parish, there is an islet that faces a small port, known as Furna, the landing place. The islet and the port are known by the name of Porto da Cruz, as well as the stream that flows into a certain distance from that location.

Porto da Cruz: Locality near the coastal area, with an islet, a small port, and a stream.
